and.name: Minesweeper
and.description: Model of Minesweeper game. The goal of the game is to uncover all fields without hitting a bombs. Cells in the game arena specify how many bombs around.

and.name: Base
and.description: Basic Features of a Minesweeper game.

and.name: GameArena
and.description: The game arena of a minesweeper game contains a field where Bombs are placed. Each cell has a number which specifies how many bombs around.

alt.name: Size
alt.description: The game arena size of the minesweeper game.

feature.name: ColoredNumbers
feature.description: All numbers of cell have a different color. All cells which have bombs around have numbers.

feature.name: Bombplacer
feature.description: Places the bombs in the game arena.

alt.name: Solver
alt.description: When the player uncover a cell which have zero bombs around, the solver uncovers all cells around which have also zero bombs around.

alt.name: Difficulty
alt.description: The difficulty of the minesweeper game is based on how many bombs are placed.

feature.name: Pause
feature.description: When you pause the game, you stop the time and the game arena is hidden.

and.name: GUI
and.description: Graphical User Interface for the game.

and.name: MainWindow
and.description: Contains the diplayed game arena, time and score.

and.name: ScoreWindow
and.description: After a game ends this window shows the score the player reached.

or.name: ChallangeWindow
or.description: Shows the challanges the player reaches/not reaches in this game.

alt.name: Score
alt.description: When you finishing a game you're getting a score.

feature.name: TimeBasedScore
feature.description: The score you get is based on the time you need to solve the game.

feature.name: WeightedScore
feature.description: You're getting more point when clicking fast successively.

or.name: Challenges
or.description: You're getting more point when you complete challenges.

feature.name: TimeBasedChallanges
feature.description: The faster the player solves the game more point he gets.

feature.name: DifficultyChallanges
feature.description: The more difficult the game is the more points the player gets.
